meta.description: Optimize the allocation of land for different crops to maximize profit.

sets.name: CROPS
sets.description: Types of crops that can be planted on the farm.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per acre for each crop.

params.name: total_area
params.description: Total available area of the farm in acres.

vars.name: area
vars.description: Area of land allocated to each crop in acres.

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: sum(area[c] * profit[c] for c in CROPS)
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from all crops.

constraints.name: total_area_constraint
constraints.description: The total area used for all crops cannot exceed the available farm area.

constraints.name: corn_wheat_ratio
constraints.description: The area for corn should be at least twice the area for wheat.

constraints.name: soybeans_sorghum_ratio
constraints.description: The area for soybeans should be at least half the area for sorghum.

constraints.name: wheat_sorghum_ratio
constraints.description: The area for wheat must be three times the area for sorghum.
